page.title: 08PARTON MANOR JUNIOR SCHOOL
page.content: PARTON MANOR JUNIOR SCHOOL STANDS AT THE END OF CRAVEN DRIVE, CHURCHDOWN. IT OPENED IN 1942 AS AN ANNEXE TO CHURCHDOWN VILLAGE SCHOOL AND WAS A PRIMARY (5-11) SCHOOL. THE JUNIORS (7-11) MOVED INTO A NEW BUILDING IN 1966. THIS BUILDING IS UNDERGOING EXTENSIVE REPAIRS AT THE MOMENT. 10 YEARS AGO WE HAD 511 PUPILS, NOW WE HAVE 218. THE AVERAGE CLASS SIZE IS 31. THE COLOUR OF OUR SCHOOL UNIFORM IS GREY, WHITE AND MAROON. SOME OF OUR FACILITIES ARE A SWIMMING POOL, PLAYING FIELD, PLAY- GROUND, HALL, DINING ROOM, NATURE RES- ERVE, PRACTICAL ROOMS AND SPORTS EQUIPMENT. WE HAVE MANY CLUBS INC- LUDING GYMNASTICS, MUSIC, LIBRARY SCHEME, CHESS, NETBALL, ROUNDERS, ATHLETICS, COUNTRY DANCING AND CROSS-COUNTRY RUNNING.
